name: Blue Afghani
description: Bred by Jordan of the Islands in Canada, Blue Afghani is an indica-dominant strain that combines genetics from Blueberry and Afghani. Its stout plants produce dense, resinous buds that fill your nose with a sweet and spicy berry aroma. Next come the powerful full-body effects that keep you anchored in relaxation while pain, anxiety, and stress float away.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Hungry, Creative, Happy, Lack of Appetite, Stress, Insomnia, Headaches, Depression, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dry Eyes
